name: Super Mazado DEMO
description:
Controls are simple; up, down, left and right arrow keys and that goes for the numpad.

To pause is to press P and O to resume game.

You take the role of a man named Mazado and you have to safely navigate your way to the end of each level. Discover the eugenic formula and empower yourself with excellent running and jumping abilities in addition to higher vitality sporting an attractive taur form! Many goodies, baddies and uglies await you on your journey! If you put your mind to it, anything can be accomplished!

NOTE; This game of Mazado is merely a demo of what the finished product may or may not look like so please leave back comments for suggestions on game improvement.
